---
title: "R Zillow Metro House Prices"
author: "Henrik Kowalkowski"
date: "12/9/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(skimr)
library(lubridate)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
data_wide <- read_csv(here("data","Metro_zhvi_uc_sfrcondo_tier_0.33_0.67_sm_sa_month.csv"))
data_long <- data_wide %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=matches("^\\d{4}-\\d{2}-\\d{2}$"),  names_to="date", values_to="zhvi")
```

```{r}
skim(data_long)
```

```{r}
data_long %<>% mutate(date = as.Date(date), year=year(date), month=month(date))
missing <- data_long %>% filter(is.na(zhvi)) %>% count(StateName, year) %>% arrange(desc(n))
```

```{r}
cor(missing$year, missing$n)
```
```{r}
data_long %>% filter(is.na(zhvi)) %>% count(year) %>% arrange(desc(n))
```
```{r}

```
